product_details_and_care:
A minimalist profile and low, stacked heel underscore the street-chic attitude of a versatile Chelsea boot that's sure to span the seasons.
1 3/4" heel (size 8.5).
3 1/4" boot shaft.
Side zip closure.
Leather upper/synthetic lining and sole.
By Sam Edelman; imported.
Women's Shoes.
Item #384255
